Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Oh Nina enikholwayo! Uma nimenyezelwa umthandazo ngosuku lwangolesihlanu phuthumani niye enkumbulweni kaMvelinqangi niyeke uhwebo, lokho kungcono kunina uma nina nazi
Ngakho-ke uma sewenziwe (sewuqediwe) umthandazo sakazekani (hambani) emhlabeni nifune umusa kaMvelinqangi futhi nikhumbule uMvelinqangi kakhulu ukuze niphumelele
Futhi uma bebona uhwebo noma injabulo baya kukona begijima futhi bakushiya umile ithi, “lokho okukuMvelinqangi kungcono kunomdlalo nohwebo futhi uMvelinqangi ungongcono kakhulu kunabaphayo”
